divs: Sighting Details1. I was on my flight home from Florida on a jet at 20-30,000 feet at dusk.2. A strangely beautiful lone cloud with pinkpurple electrical lightshow win.3. A hover craft was what it initially struck me as being w2 greenishyellowlights staring out from inside the edge of the cloud, as if hiding.4. Calm intrigued during sighting.Surprised I asked no one to witness, after.5. Hovering, perfectly still. The plane moved past but the lites never moved.6. I didnt notice it until I saw a lightning bolt come from under the cloud andI stared at until my plane went past it I lost sight as I looked back out mywindow.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Parkland
There were no other sightings in Parkland on or around July 7th 2003
